select
from payables_detail where pade_Yn=0 and pade_custom7 is null ORDER BY pade_id DESC

SELECT paydetail_id,Payables_id,supplier_id, staff_id, currency_id,project_id,pade_sourcelist, pade_sourcetime,pade_sourcenumber,pade_invoiceno, pade_transaction,pade_transactionname,pade_team_name, pade_staff_name,pade_project_name,pade_currency_name, pade_currency_inexchange,pade_price,pade_Currentbalance, pade_Discountamount,pade_Amountcharged,pade_Offsetamount, pade_Auditing,pade_yn,pade_custom1,pade_custom2,pade_custom3, pade_custom4,pade_custom5,pade_custom6,pade_custom7, pade_custom8,pade_custom9,pade_custom10 FROM payables_detail WHERE paydetail_id=#{paydetail_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND pade_yn=0 AND pade_custom7 is null ORDER BY paydetail_id DESC
